decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following:  Proposed (Front & Side) Elevation drawing no.02, Proposed (Rear & Side) Elevation drawing no.03 Rev A, Proposed Ground Floor Plan drawing no.04, Proposed First Floor Plan drawing no.05, Proposed Second Floor Plan drawing no.06 Rev A and Proposed Section Plan drawing no.07 Rev A
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be as per submitted application form and in accordance with condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - section 12
| The proposed flank window to the gable end facing no.20 Bridge Avenue shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level and remain in perpetuity.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021, policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
| No new openings to the extension notwithstanding approved plans as per Condition 2, shall be incorporated without prior written confirmation from the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D1, D4 and of the London Plan 2021, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1 and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012
description: Alteration of roof to raise ridge height; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope
